lyrics:
I can taste your kiss on my lips
And I'm wrapped around your fingertips
As I watch the moonlight dancin' on your skin

Your green eyes and the sweet red wine
Go to my head girl every time and I get drunk on you
I lose control and then here I go again

Fallin' for you even though I know you're only playin' with my heart
Tomorrow might be hell
But a night or two of lovin' you is better than never at all
And I can't help myself

So I'll just hold on, I'll just hold on
I'll just hold on till you're gone

Girl, I know you're a gypsy soul
And I'm just a stop along your road
And you hang around long enough to blow my mind

If I had a star for every scar you tattooed on my heart
I could fill up the Oklahoma sky
So girl I don't know why

I'm fallin' for you even though I know you're only playin' with my heart
Tomorrow might be hell
But a night or two of lovin' you is better than never at all
And I can't help myself

So I'll just hold on, I'll just hold on
I'll just hold on till you're gone

I'll just hold on, I'll just hold on
I'll just hold on till you're gone

I look down and my cell phone rings
And I see your name and I know what that means but I don't care
I'll just hold on till you're gone

Every time you need to take it home
Seeing you there just breaks my heart but I don't care
I'll just hold on till you're gone

Your green eyes and that sweet red wine
Go to my head girl every time but I don't care
I'll just hold on till you're gone
